snippet.title: Pixel Game Maker Series: Biggerman.io - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
NOTE: Even though it says it supports English, the game is actually all in Japanese. And the game doesn't actually save when you quit.

One left-stick rules them ALL! Biggerman - a simple yet satisfying action game for everyone! Easy but exciting combat in 1 min! Smash! Absorb! And Get Bigger!

Created with Pixel Game Maker MV!

Pixel Game Maker Series, Biggerman.io, Pixel Game Maker MV (C) Gotcha Gotcha Games
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1812650/Pixel_Game_Maker_Series_Biggermanio/
Also available on Nintendo Switch

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #pixelgamemakermv #pixelgamemakerseries #biggermanio #gotchagotchagames
